quoteText: Agents with whom we share such information for these reasons are generally bound by confidentiality obligations and, unless we tell you differently, our Agents do not have any right to use information we share with them beyond the scope and duration of what is necessary to assist us.
title: Third parties used by Tumblr are bound by confidentiality obligations

tosdr.case: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations
tosdr.tldr: Third parties that assist Tumblr are generally bound by confidentiality obligations that forbid them to use your personal information for other purposes.
